help-file.title: SPRINGLEAP
help-file.content:
Syntax: springleap <victim> (while kneeling) Aggressive: Yes
Springleap is a bash-like skill with painful consequences. The springleaper crouches to his knees and suddenly jumps into his opponent. If successful, the opponent will be knocked off balance and fall to the ground for a couple of rounds, unable to defend himself. If the springleaper fails, however, he will be the one that is knocked to the ground and unable to defend himself!
A monk who has chosen the path of the Dragon Disciple has sharpened many of his fighting skills, including springleap. The extra abilities include performing attacks with hands and feet while knocking down the opponent and being able to springleap from far away by using the added momentum of back- flips.
